SEARCH
Package com.zetaplugins.essentialz.storage.repositories.ignores

Interface IgnoresRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
SQLIgnoresRepository
public interface IgnoresRepository
Repository interface for managing player ignore relationships.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    isPlayerIgnoring(UUID playerUuid, UUID targetUuid)
    Checks if a player is ignoring a target player.
    boolean
    togglePlayerIgnore(UUID playerUuid, UUID targetUuid)
    Toggles the ignore status of a target player for a specific player.

  • Method Details

    • togglePlayerIgnore

      boolean togglePlayerIgnore(UUID playerUuid, UUID targetUuid)
      Toggles the ignore status of a target player for a specific player.
      Parameters:
      playerUuid - The UUID of the player who is toggling the ignore status.
      targetUuid - The UUID of the target player to be ignored or unignored.
      Returns:
      true if the target player is now ignored, false if unignored.

    • isPlayerIgnoring

      boolean isPlayerIgnoring(UUID playerUuid, UUID targetUuid)
      Checks if a player is ignoring a target player.
      Parameters:
      playerUuid - The UUID of the player.
      targetUuid - The UUID of the target player.
      Returns:
      true if the player is ignoring the target player, false otherwise.
